mapper.sql: id, createdAt, updatedAt, isEnable, requestId, engineerId, engineerName, punctual, attitude, service, comment, appraiserid, appraiserName, appraiserDepartmentId, appraiserDepartmentName

repair_evaluation.id AS id, repair_evaluation.createdAt AS createdAt, repair_evaluation.updatedAt AS updatedAt, repair_evaluation.isEnable AS isEnable, repair_evaluation.requestId AS requestId, repair_evaluation.engineerId AS engineerId, repair_evaluation.engineerName AS engineerName, repair_evaluation.punctual AS punctual, repair_evaluation.attitude AS attitude, repair_evaluation.service AS service, repair_evaluation.comment AS comment, repair_evaluation.appraiserid AS appraiserid, repair_evaluation.appraiserName AS appraiserName, repair_evaluation.appraiserDepartmentId AS appraiserDepartmentId, repair_evaluation.appraiserDepartmentName AS appraiserDepartmentName
mapper.update:
UPDATE repair_evaluation
createdAt = #{createdAt},
updatedAt = #{updatedAt},
isEnable = #{isEnable},
requestId = #{requestId},
engineerId = #{engineerId},
engineerName = #{engineerName},
punctual = #{punctual},
attitude = #{attitude},
service = #{service},
comment = #{comment},
appraiserid = #{appraiserid},
appraiserName = #{appraiserName},
appraiserDepartmentId = #{appraiserDepartmentId},
appraiserDepartmentName = #{appraiserDepartmentName},
WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE repair_evaluation SET isEnable = TRUE WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE repair_evaluation SET isEnable = FALSE WHERE id = #{id}
